channel.title: My Runescape Client
channel.description:
This is no joke, I worked hard on this for quite a while, and most of it is my coding(other than modified high score and world populations)
Here is where u can find it [url=http://www.kloplop321.com/stuff-i-made/rsclient.msi]http://www.kloplop321.com/stuff-i-made/rsclient.msi[/url] This is VB .NET so you need .NET framework 2.0, search microsoft for dotnetfx.exe it is the full .NET framework install(which is needed, this is not supported by compact .NET framework)
Anyway, post comments, ideas, if you find an error, please post :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:31:35 PM[/size][hr]soz I forgot to give a key, here 0-66-472-4965-21949 notice its a 1-2-3-4-5 pattern I was bored lol[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:58:26 PM[/size][hr]This is no noob client, and not 25 >25% leached code either. all credit is given. I think.

item.title: My Runescape Client
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

well that stinks, thanks for your efforts cruel. I can put flash on my program now im happy! and i can make the splash screen animated and the flash embeded.

i would only want an internet tool that can read and diaplay, also without the “show source” control on it. and not register it in the history(dont want em finding my files :))

Read full topic

item.title: My Runescape Client
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

There’s a mozilla control someone else has made:
http://www.iol.ie/~locka/mozilla/mozilla.htm

But it’s not very good (incomplete).

Read full topic

item.title: My Runescape Client
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

ilyaostr9:

umm, if you have firefox installed, in VB 2005, click right click the tool box, click “Choose Items” and search for the firefox control under “COM Controls”

Oh? I don’t have it…

Read full topic

item.title: My Runescape Client
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:5, topic:30201”]And less posts in a row will get more replies too, and less replies from mods.[/quote] he, sure

[quote=“Ron, post:4, topic:30201”]Any screenshots? List of features? Easy to customize? Different styles?

comon people i want some replies =)

More information before more people download and install and you will get more replies. :)[/quote]
I will get some screen shots

I can’t belive i forgot lol.
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 06:56:26 AM[/size][hr]lol i tried making a screen shot movie with captivate… ended up 73 megs, tried camtastia as a demonstration, 375 megs… so here is a mega screen shot!!!

my program can do full screen, i had to use both my screens to do this screen shot lol… anyway, i use monitor1:1600-1200 monitor2:1280-1024 so you can see everything
anyway, it can update the total players, rune HQ is down so thats why I didn’t show it. the account creator works and everything. you can scan it or whatever you like, there is nothing. it has the time in the bottom left corner, the help window, look for it and read it, also i hidden a easter egg.(try every 365 days of the year - only clue i will give) also i made this so it knows if it is leap year or not. anyway is that convincing enough? Ron?
